questions.question: What is text-to-video generation?
questions.answer: Creating video content from written prompts.

questions.question: What is prompt engineering?
questions.answer: Crafting inputs to guide AI outputs.

questions.question: Why are deepfakes controversial?
questions.answer: They can mislead or impersonate people.

questions.question: What is watermarking?
questions.answer: Embedding a visible or invisible mark to identify content origin.

questions.question: How can bias appear in generated media?
questions.answer: Through training data or prompt phrasing.

questions.question: What is attribution?
questions.answer: Crediting the source or creator of content.

questions.question: What is a future trend in GenAI media?
What is the role of copyright in GenAI?
questions.answer: Protects original works and governs reuse.
